level.text: During resolution of a protest, all procurement activities and, where applicable, contractor performance, shall continue unless the Contracting Officer determines there is a reason to suspend or delay all or part of the procurement activities and/or contractor performance.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 613 (January 22, 1999) [EXPIRED]; as Final Rulemaking published at 46 DCR 7349 (September 17, 1999); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 4484 (June 12, 2009).
